name: WalkMan (dwarfo)
description:
You're a robot, held in prison by other robots. They gave you a radio thinking all you could do was listen to music. They were wrong. You must control the other inmates in aiding your escape.

Instructions:
Move player with 'A' and 'D' Keys
Jump with 'Space' key
Move radio frequency with 'Left Arrow' and 'Right Arrow'
'R' to restart

Game made from Global Game Jam 2018
GGJ Site: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/walkman

Credits: 

Coders: Thomas Tran, Chris Mendoza
Artist: Hala Alsaid
Music: Michael Win
Idea: Michael Win, Brandon Luong, Thomas Tran, Chris Mendoza
Support: Howard Tan
